message: Hello Bob, I believe this product would be a valuable asset to you.  To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,900,000. I'm open to discussing the price further.
I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1,600,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the pricing.  However, the value this product brings is quite significant and $1,900,000 is a fair reflection of that. To move things along, I'm willing to come down to $1,800,000.  This is my final offer.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm going to counter with $1,700,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
